Texts.Chs: 一幅令人难忘的画，描绘了一种神秘的传说中的海洋生物。
Texts.Eng: A haunting painting of a mysterious legendary sea creature.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人喜欢这个深沉的海洋怪物。
Texts.Eng: Floran likes this deep ssea monster.

Texts.Chs: 我想在地球上也有过类似怪物的故事。
Texts.Eng: I think there were tales of a similar looking monster back on Earth.

Texts.Chs: 这种生物看起来太优雅了，不可能是怪物。
Texts.Eng: This creature looks far too elegant to supposedly be a monster.

Texts.Chs: 这幅画的细节令人惊讶，只不过是艺术家的诠释。
Texts.Eng: This painting is surprisingly detailed for only being an artist's interpretation.

Texts.Chs: 那些鳍几乎像翅膀。。。这种生物也能飞行吗？
Texts.Eng: Those fins almost resemble wings... Could this creature be capable of flight as well?

Texts.Chs: 多么令人不安的轮廓。我希望这个生物不存在。
Texts.Eng: What an unnerving looking silhouette. I would hope this creature doesn't actually exist.

Texts.Chs: 哎呀。那双眼睛让我毛骨悚然。
Texts.Eng: Yikes. Those eyes are givin' me the shivers.
